titles.title: Mighty, Mighty, Mighty Is The Lord Our God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mighty, mighty, mighty is the Lord our God.
Mighty, mighty, mighty is the Lord our God.
Mighty, mighty, mighty is the Lord our God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mighty in the midst of thee.
Mighty to save and mighty to heal.
Mighty to strengthen, mighty to fill.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mighty, mighty, mighty is the Lord our God.
Mighty in the midst of thee.
